summary: As corporate collusion descends upon players, Valthesda the Wrecking Ball and his crazed minions descend upon Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=2][i]As corporate collusion descends upon players, Valthesda the Wrecking Ball and his crazed minions descend upon Whiterun.[/i][/size][/font]Â 
[/b]
[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65154-1-1430073306.jpg[/img]


[b][font=Georgia][size=4][UPDATE][/size]
Victory? It seems that user outcry has [url=http://steamcommunity.com/games/SteamWorkshop/announcements/detail/208632365253244218]prompted the swift demise of commercial mods on Steam Workshop[/url]. Valthesda is still a fun diversion for anybody wanting some lore-unfriendly urban havoc, so I'll leave this goofy plugin up.[/font][/b]

[font=Georgia][size=3]
[/size][/font][center][font=Georgia][size=3]***[/size][/font][/center][font=Georgia]
[size=6][u]Description[/u][/size]
[size=3]This is a simple mod with a ridiculous giant boss, or vice versa, and you probably won't want to add it to your savegame after playing. Whiterun descends into complete chaos, and Valthesda has a tendency to cull the population before he goes down. I repeat: [/size][b]don't overwrite your main save unless you're cool with a corpse-littered Whiterun[/b][size=3]. Then again, if you don't mind the carnage, some of those corpses might yield a silly book and some useful crap. Ah, metaphors galore....[/size]


[/font][center][font=Georgia][size=3]***
[/size][/font][/center][font=Georgia]
[size=6][u]Install[/u][/size]
[size=3]Download and activate with NMM. Go to Whiterun and [try not to] die.[/size][/font]
author: Undead Rufus
